glosses: To misrepresent something to look much better than it actually is in order to trick someone; to put lipstick on a pig.

examples.text: Hükümet sadece göz boyuyor, sağ eliyle verdiğini sol eliyle geri alıyor.
examples.translation: The government is just putting lipstick on a pig, gives with the right hand and takes back with the left.

etymology: Compound of göz (“eye”) + boyamak (“to paint”), literally “to paint (someone's) eye”. Cognate with Kazakh көз бойау (köz boiau).
